title: What should I choose between IT or ICT? - Quora
tags: Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology (DA-IICT)

response.answer_text: Both are almost the same. If at all you want to be only in the software development, IT would be berter. And it is familiar branch also. If you want to have options for your job, i.e both in software development as well as networking & communication fields, you can better chose ICT. But this branch is not much familiar to the world. There will not be much difference when comes to college placements. Except the communication/ networks subjects all other subjects are same to both the branches. A2A.

You can choose anyone of them,both have their own merits and demerits, If you have interest only in programming and doing software work you have to choose IT,but if you have also interest in how communication system works then you should prefer ICT because it includes both communication technology and subjects of computer science.
